attributes.action: To debate the continues killings of #BIAFRANS in the Nigerian State.
attributes.additional_details: The 100 years of the Nigerian State has expired on 30th December 2014. BIAFRANS is asking the British government and the  Nigerian State to let go of their resources and to give them their freedom. Since then the 2 governments has refused to listen or acknowledged that the Amalgamation has expired and since then BIAFRANS has been killed. tortured, imprisoned and sentence without a trial disappeared without trace. Women and children been raped if they go to  do their farming. BIAFRA or DEATH
attributes.background: In 1967 there was a  country named BIAFRA before the British colonial slave masters decided to amalgamated the Nigerian State in 1914 to 2014. It was decided in the amalgamated documents if after the 100 years the 3 different nations didn't agree with each other they're free to be a nation.
